Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at 43rd/Cottage Grove

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at 79th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at 79th.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
